docs.lead_paragraph: Wake Forest Innovation Quarter updates the technology business park to fit 21st-century development priorities: proximity and collaboration.

headline.main: Technology Overtakes Tobacco in Winston-Salem, N.C.

docs.abstract: Private-public partnership led by developer Wexford Science and Technology is creating 145-acre technology business park on site of former cigarette manufacturing plant outside Winston-Salem, North Carolina; Wake Forest Innovation Quarter will focus on needs of 21st-century technology companies, creating facilities for data analysis, biotech health research and medical education.
docs.snippet: Wake Forest Innovation Quarter updates the technology business park to fit 21st-century development priorities: proximity and collaboration.
